original_title: 人妻秘書、汗と接吻に満ちた社長室中出し性交 マドンナ
overview: Katsu, the husband who inherited the long-established whiskey maker from his father. His wife Kana also supported her as a managing director and secretary, but her father resented her son's aggressive management policy and made Ozawa, the director, the president. My husband who lost his place quit the company and only Kana was supposed to serve as Ozawa's secretary. However, as a condition, Ozawa asked Kana for a physical relationship. She will be humiliatingly robbed of her lips and will be toyed with her body in her president's office in broad daylight. Such obscene days of her gradually erode Kana's concept of chastity.
title: This Married Woman Secretary Is Having Sweat-Soaked, Kiss-Filled Creampie Sex In The President’s Office Directed By: Nagae – Kana Mito
